text: Hapters are short, peg-like attachments of the lower surface of lichen to the substrate on which they grow. They are distinct from rhizines, which are more hair-like.McCune, B. & Geiser, L. Macrolichens of the Pacifica Northwest. 2nd Edition., Oregon State University Press. 2009. ==References== Category:Lichens Category:Fungal morphology and anatomy
title: Hapter
